DOC.brief_title: Dietary Genetic Factors Asthma & Chronic Bronchitis Cohort Chinese Singaporeans
DOC.detailed_description: There suggestive evidence role diet etiology asthma chronic bronchitis . However , prospective data . We propose expand collaboration Singapore Chinese Health Study examine dietary , environmental , genetic factor , along interaction , relation risk develop asthma chronic bronchitis . The Singapore Chinese Health Study ( NIH grant CA080205 ) cohort 63,257 men woman Chinese ethnicity Singapore age 45-74 year enrollment 1993 1998 . Telephone follow-up cohort update outcome information begin 1999 ongoing . We expect identify 538 case incident asthma 672 case incident chronic bronchitis current follow-up questionnaire cycle complete 2004 . In proposal , would validate self-reports incident asthma , obtain follow-up data entire cohort perform analyse diet smoke relation outcome , analyze genetic material case incident asthma chronic bronchitis control cohort . In proposal examine follow hypothesis : 1 . Higher intake fruit and/or antioxidant micronutrient decrease risk develop asthma chronic bronchitis . . Effects fruit and/or antioxidant micronutrient may differ smoke history 2 . Common polymorphisms gene involve response oxidative stress influence risk asthma chronic bronchitis . We initially propose examine polymorphism three gene -- glutathione S-tranferase M1 , glutathione S-transferase P1 , matrix metalloproteinase-1 . However , plan examine additional relevant polymorphism future , especially take advantage high throughput screen candidate gene asthma chronic bronchitis . It possible 2004 sample set available compelling candidate high throughput screen may available u low cost . Thus re-evaluate choice sample available . 3 . Polymorphisms gene interact fruit/antioxidant intake and/or smoke influence risk asthma chronic bronchitis .
